content.text:
# NASCAR O'Reilly Auto Parts Series at Rockingham

Stock car races in the NASCAR O'Reilly Auto Parts Series have been held at Rockingham Speedway from the series' inception in 1982 until 2004, and again since 2025.
Spring race
|Laps=250|Previous names=Coca-Cola 200 (1982–1983)Komfort Koach 200 (1984–1985)Protecta-Liner 200 (1986)Goodwrench 200 (1988–1995)Goodwrench Service 200 (1996–1997)GM Goodwrench Service Plus 200 (1998)Alltel 200 (1999–2001)1-866RBCTerm.com 200 (2002)Rockingham 200 (2003)'''Goody's Headache Powder 200' (2004)|Most wins driver=Mark Martin (5)|Most wins team=Roush Racing (5)|Most wins manufacturer=Ford (8)|Logo=File:Rocking-Ham-Speedway-Xfinity-Series-Race-Logo-Announce.webp}}
